scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm --prefix autonomy/server run dev" "npm --prefix autonomy/ui run dev"
scripts.build: tsc && npm --prefix autonomy/ui run build && npm --prefix autonomy/server run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix autonomy/server run lint && npm --prefix autonomy/ui run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix autonomy/server run typecheck && npm --prefix autonomy/ui run typecheck
scripts.test: npm --prefix autonomy/server run test && npm --prefix autonomy/ui run test
